original_text: And if the prophet be deceived when he hath spoken a thing, I the Lord have deceived that prophet, and I will stretch out my hand upon him, and will destroy him from the midst of my people Israel.
korean_text: 만일 선지자가 유혹을 받고 말을 하면 나 여호와가 그 선지자를 유혹을 받게 하였음이거니와 내가 손을 펴서 내 백성 이스라엘 가운데에서 그를 멸할 것이라

sentences.original_text: And if the prophet be deceived
when he hath spoken a thing
I the Lord have deceived that prophet
and I will stretch out my hand upon him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 내 손을 그에게 뻗을 것이며

sentences.original_text: from the midst of my people Israel
